# Add Keyboard Handlers to Clickable Elements

## ðŸŸ¡ Medium Priority

### Summary
Clickable spans missing keyboard support.

### Implementation
```typescript
<button
  type="button"
  onClick={handleClick}
  className="..."
>
  {text}
</button>

// Or if must use span:
<span
  role="button"
  tabIndex={0}
  onKeyDown={(e) => {
    if (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ') {
      e.preventDefault();
      handleClick();
    }
  }}
  onClick={handleClick}
>
  {text}
</span>
```

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add onKeyDown to clickable spans
- [ ] Support Enter and Space
- [ ] Or convert to buttons
- [ ] Add role='button'
- [ ] Test keyboard nav

### Estimated Effort
2-3 hours
